sqlMap.select: SELECT t2.t2id, mm.mmword, jm.jmword, jm.jmromaji, wt.wtname, t2.t2correct, t2.t2incorrect FROM jm INNER JOIN t2_mm_jm AS t2 ON t2.jmid = jm.jmid INNER JOIN mm ON t2.mmid = mm.mmid INNER JOIN wt ON t2.wtid = wt.wtid WHERE jm.jmstatus = '1' AND t2.t2status = '1' AND mm.mmstatus = '1' AND wt.wtstatus = '1' AND mm.mmword = #value#;

SELECT t3.t3id, en.enword, jm.jmword, jm.jmromaji, wt.wtname, t3.t3correct, t3.t3incorrect FROM jm INNER JOIN t3_en_jm AS t3 ON t3.jmid = jm.jmid INNER JOIN en ON t3.enid = en.enid INNER JOIN wt ON t3.wtid = wt.wtid WHERE jm.jmstatus = '1' AND t3.t3status = '1' AND en.enstatus = '1' AND wt.wtstatus = '1' AND en.enword = #value#;

SELECT t6.t6id, jm.jmword, jk.jkword, jm.jmromaji, wt.wtname, t6.t6correct, t6.t6incorrect FROM jm INNER JOIN t6_jm_jk AS t6 ON t6.jmid = jm.jmid INNER JOIN jk ON t6.jkid = jk.jkid INNER JOIN wt ON t6.wtid = wt.wtid WHERE jm.jmstatus = '1' AND t6.t6status = '1' AND jk.jkstatus = '1' AND wt.wtstatus = '1' AND jk.jkword = #value#;
